DataDetectScanResult.name: DataDetectScanResult
DataDetectScanResult.description: Represents the results of a DataDetect scan policy data scan.

CreatedDate.description: Time and date when an instance of PII is added to the scan result.

DataDetectJobSessionId.description: ID of the job session associated with the scan policy. This field is a relationship field.

FieldName.description: UDD name from standard fields, or custom field ID from custom fields.

NamedEntityCount.description: Number of times PII is found.

NamedEntityType.description: Type of PII found in the record of the scan policy object.

ObjectName.description: KeyPrefix of the scan policy object that contains PII.
